description:
Gladiator representing Ginokuniya Books.
The master of the the Kujin-style of martial arts based on medieval battlefield combat also has the ability to anticipate the opponent`s next move like a professional shogi (Japanese chess) player. Pursuing a certain agenda, he finds his way onto the S.S. Kengan by befriending Ken Ohya of Ginokuniya Books.
Source: Official site
name: Kaneda Suekichi
